LEG-IT Solution

Joint solution for legal IT & aspect

Diptimate Consultants Private Limited (DCPL) is an emerging IT enabling company with its LEG-IT (LEG denotes "Legal" & IT denotes Information technology, both are taken care with its macro meaning) concept patronage. We are a team of multi-professional like people having qualification of Chartered Accountancy, Company Secretary, Cost Accountancy, Advocacy, Doctor, Architect, Real-Estate planner, B-tech, BCA, M-tech & many more.
